G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in components
 
Game() - Constructor for class components.Game
This is a no-args constructor that initiates the game.
Game.STATE - Enum in components
This enumeration holds the constant game states.
GameObject - Class in components
 
GameObject(float, float) - Constructor for class components.GameObject
This constructor takes in the x and y coordinate of this game object.
gameState - Static variable in class components.Game
 
gameWin() - Method in class components.DrawingSurface
Checks if the game is finished with a boolean method.
getBounds() - Method in class components.GameObject
Gets the rectangular boundary around this game object.
getBounds() - Method in class game.Ball
 
getBounds() - Method in class game.Brick
 
getBounds() - Method in class game.Paddle
 
getBrickHeight() - Method in class game.Brick
Gets the height of the brick.
getBrickWidth() - Method in class game.Brick
Gets the width of the brick.
getColor() - Method in class game.Brick
Gets the color of the brick.
getPaddleWidth() - Method in class game.Paddle
Gets the width of the paddle.
getSpeed() - Method in class game.Paddle
Gets the speed(how many pixels it moves) of the paddle.
